shapecode_3_border_g=1.000
shapecode_3_border_b=1.000
shapecode_3_border_a=0.100
per_frame_1=//Disturbed - Deify
per_frame_2=
per_frame_3=wzoom = 0.18*sin(time);
per_frame_4=q3=wzoom;
per_frame_5=q1 = 0.5 + 0.3*sin(-time*2);
per_frame_6=q2 = 0.5 + 0.3*cos(-time);
per_frame_7=
per_frame_8=ob_r = ob_r + 0.05*(0.6*sin(time*1.3) + 0.4*sin(0.98*time));
per_frame_9=ob_b = ob_b + 0.05*(0.6*sin(time*1.1) + 0.4*sin(0.78*time));
per_frame_10=ob_g = ob_g + 0.05*(0.6*sin(time*1.2) + 0.4*sin(0.6*time));
per_frame_11=
per_frame_12=rx = 0.5+0.25*sin(time*0.25);
per_frame_13=ry = 0.5+0.25*sin(time*0.5);
per_frame_14=q4=rx;
per_frame_15=q5=ry;
per_frame_16=
per_frame_17=q6 = 1+1*sin(time*0.5);
warp_1=`shader_body
warp_2=`{
warp_3=`
warp_4=`    //based on the equation F(Z) = Z ^ pi + C
warp_5=`        
warp_6=`    float2 zoom = 2;
warp_7=`    float2 c = float2(q4, q5);
warp_8=`    
warp_9=`    float2 uxy = (float2(uv.x-0.5, uv.y-0.5))*zoom;
warp_10=`
warp_11=`    //change *1 to control h and v size of the fractal without screwing it up
warp_12=`    float moduz = sqrt(uxy.x*uxy.x*1 + uxy.y*uxy.y*1);
warp_13=`
warp_14=`    //change *1.91 to control how many "arms" it has
warp_15=`    //most values won't line up at 2pi, try *2 for instance, then try *2.55
warp_16=`    float thetaz = atan2(uxy.y, uxy.x)*1.91;
warp_17=`
warp_18=`
warp_19=`    uxy = (float2((pow(moduz, 3.14159)*cos(thetaz*3.14159)), (pow(moduz, 3.14159)*sin(thetaz*3.14159))))+c;
warp_20=`    
warp_21=` 
warp_22=`    ret = tex2D(sampler_fc_main, uxy).xyz +0.01;    
warp_23=`        
warp_24=`}
comp_1=`shader_body 
comp_2=`{ 
comp_3=`    //flexi's bump map effect
comp_4=`
comp_5=`    float2 d = texsize.zw*8; 
comp_6=`    float3 dx = ( GetBlur1(uv + float2(1,0)*d) - GetBlur1(uv-float2(1,0)*d) ); 
comp_7=`    float3 dy = ( GetBlur1(uv + float2(0,1)*d) - GetBlur1(uv-float2(0,1)*d) ); 
comp_8=`    float2 light_pos = float2(q1,q2); 
comp_9=`    float3 col = float3(4,4,4); 
comp_10=`    float c = 4; 
comp_11=`    float dd = 16; 
comp_12=`    float3 plastic; 
comp_13=`    plastic.x = col.x/(1+dd*pow(length( uv - float2(dx.x,dy.x)*c - light_pos),0.5)); 
comp_14=`    plastic.y = col.y/(1+dd*pow(length( uv - float2(dx.y,dy.y)*c - light_pos),0.5)); 
comp_15=`    plastic.z = col.z/(1+dd*pow(length( uv - float2(dx.z,dy.z)*c - light_pos),0.5)); 
comp_16=`
comp_17=`    ret = plastic*GetPixel(uv); 
comp_18=`    ret *= 3;
comp_19=`}
